subject: Heptic mounting bracket
description_text:
I'm looking to purchase the Pro X Ultra with Haptics but I don't see a
mounting bracket for the clutch pedal. How does that haptic get attached?
This is the page I'm on looking for the clutch bracket.

https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-pro-x-ultra-pedal-with-haptics

Thank you



-- 
Jason Ulesich
cell: 715-410-0075
jason@ulesich.com

conversations.body_text: Hi Jason Ulesich,    You can refer to the installation method in this video, and remember to select our latest U-shaped mounting bracket.  https://www.instagram.com/p/DQ_WxBuDLVU/    https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-racing-sim-pedal-pro-x-ultra
